import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { StoreContext } from '../Menu/CONTEXT/StoreContext' import './Cart.css' const Cart = () => { const {cartitem,remove,food_list}=useContext(StoreContext) console.log(cartitem) return (

Items

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove


{food_list.map((item,index)=>{ if(cartitem[item._id]) { return(

{item.name}

{item.price}

{cartitem[item._id]}

{item.price*cartitem[item._id]}

remove(item._id)}> x

) } })}

Cart Totals

) } export default Cart
